metadata.name: System Network Connections Discovery Via Net.EXE
metadata.comment: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the network.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\net.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\net1.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('net\.exe', 'net1\.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' use')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' sessions'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' use ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' sessions '))))

output.summary: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the network.
